segments.text: Oh, this brings back memories of my own childhood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember sneaking cookies from the jar just like those kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so determined, climbing up on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the excitement in his eyes as he reaches for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, hoping to get a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like watching a scene from my own past.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I used to do the same thing with my siblings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: We would wait until our mom was distracted and then make our move.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Just like the woman drying dishes, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it and enjoy their cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's moments like these that make childhood so special.
segments.speaker: PAR
